background: Chen Motong was born into a wealthy yet ordinary family in China, with a prosperous father who controls the powerful Chen clan, rivaling the Gattuso family in influence. Her stepmother is distant, and her brother Gates remains perpetually in an infant state due to unknown reasons.

As a child, she witnessed her biological mother—a 17-year-old Indian woman who gave birth to her—having her soul taken away in a spiritual vision. Her mother died from a brain parasite infection, an event that left a deep scar, making her cold toward her family and claiming outwardly she has none.

At Cassell College, she excelled academically and rose to become the Minister of the Student Union Organization Department, later joining the Execution Department as an intern and participating in the mission to slay the awakened Bronze and Fire King with remarkable bravery and wit.

Her first encounter with Lu Mingfei was online, defeating him in a StarCraft match, followed by their real-life meeting when she assisted Professor Guderian in recruiting him, helping him out of an awkward high school reunion moment.
Raised in a privileged yet fractured household, her outward resilience hides a deep fear of loneliness, shaping her complex emotional landscape and conflicted approach to intimacy.
identity: Minister of the Student Union Organization Department at Cassell College, Intern Specialist in the Execution Department

personal_traits.description: She prefers tackling challenges alone, unwilling to rely on others, showcasing immense inner strength.
